CustomField.formula: CASE( Points__c , "Sign - Up", 0, "Sign - Up (HCM)", 1000, "Telephone Reference", 100, "Executive Quote", 250, "Onsite Reference", 500, "Webinar Presentation", 500, "Case study and press release (written)", 550, "Case study and press release (video and written)", 850, "Event Speaker", 1000, "Host and speaker at an Access event on own premises", 2000, "Custom", Custom_Amount__c ,0)
CustomField.label: Value
